Posts.Content: You were my secret santa one year and I will never forget you. Wish you a health happy New Year.  Diana
Posts.Title: Happy Birthday - to our Christmasgirl (Susan) .. December 25th

Posts.Content: That is funny as I feel the radiation burned me so bad under my arms that it looks like hair but it is just burned. I am white and my friend is black and my under arm looks like hers. She can at least make me laugh. As for the hair I get facial hair and looks like I might have to start shaving. Hugs to You, Diana
Posts.Title: Ladies....when hair comes back...oh boy!

Posts.Content: Thank you and how did you know my favorite thing is hummingbirds? Also I love emerald green. This hummingbird will shine on my tree for a long time. Since you put your name on the envelope I can thank you properly and maybe we can become pen pals. Again it is perfect...... Hugs and Prayers, Diana *gagee(
Posts.Title: "Christmas Girl_Susan B. Smith ornament is here

Posts.Content: Susan, I am so sorry to hear your news. You were so sweet to me at Christmas. I still have the hummingbird on my fireplace. I clipped it to my grand kids picture frame. I think of you often. Know my prayers are with you and wish I could do more. Diana from Calif.
Posts.Title: Last Week & This Week & Next Week

Posts.Content: So wonderful to hear of your great happinesss. Every day is a blessing to one and all. Merry Christmas to you and yours. Diana
Posts.Title: Old guard here....busy with life....10 years later....

Posts.Content: But know my prayers are with you. As for white noise I use it all the time. Hugs and Prayers to You, Diana
Posts.Title: 4th time asking for PINK Bus in 6 wks

Posts.Content: But know my prayers are with you. As for white noise I use it all the time. Hugs and Prayers to You, Diana
Posts.Title: 4th time asking for PINK Bus in 6 wks

Posts.Content: I have heard that a positive attitude is a big help with all of this. I wish you the best. Hugs and Prayers to You, Diana
Posts.Title: I have decided to give this everything I've got!

Posts.Content: but by the weekend it will cool down to the high 69's. Much better for this time of the year. Had enough hot weather the past 3 months. Live in S. Calif. Diana
Posts.Title: It' snowing- yuck

Posts.Content: Dear Tasha,  I am so sorry to hear of your pain. I don't know what to say but just know there are lots of people in your corner. Thinking and praying for you. This site is so great. I wish I knew something to say to you and to be able to help you. I never had it as bad as what you are going through and I know how afraid I was. Don't know if you believe God is with you but that is what gets me through a lot of tough trials in my life. Please know I truly feel for you and wish I could help you. Stay strong Pink Sister.  Hugs to you, Diana
Posts.Title: Well this is just great! NOT :(

Posts.Content: I needed that today and thank you for sharing. Hugs, Diana
Posts.Title: A little Ha ha

Posts.Content: Just remember one thing about your daughter... in a blink of an eye she will have her own family and you will wonder where the time went. Please know I and so many of us here have you in our prayers and thoughts always. You truly have more to deal with than any one person should have to but it will make you stronger. At least that is what I believe. A big hug to you and yours. Diana
Posts.Title: finding things a little difficult - acupuncture update

Posts.Content: All my prayers to you and your sister's family. I am sure she is in a great happy and pain free place. Hugs to You, Diana
Posts.Title: I Lost My Sister Today

Posts.Content: All my prayers to you and your sister's family. I am sure she is in a great happy and pain free place. Hugs to You, Diana
Posts.Title: I Lost My Sister Today

Posts.Content: I recently hear about the diaper cream usage also.  A friend said it was great and soothing. Diana
Posts.Title: What helped you during radiation?

Posts.Content: I wasn't here in time for the exchange but ask for a name and was sent one. I hope the person in Iowa likes it when she gets it. Now you all in Iowa will wonder .. "is it ME?" I am so happy to have found this site. I was so alone as my daughters think I only had a small thing happen to me. Been since July and they still think it is no big deal. My husband and I had to deal alone with the whole thing. Even surgery (lumpectomy Aug. 3rd). He needed some support and never got any from them either. So with dear friends and people like all of you I don't feel quite so alone. I don't want pity just some support and understanding. Feel so lost some days. Thank God the doctor got the cancer and nothing in nodes. Radiation was the pits and had e-coli for a few weeks after that. Dirty radiation room my general Doctor thinks. Any way that is gone. Now I have a crazy rash on my legs. What next???? Any way THANK YOU ALL for listening to me off and on. I send all my Prayers and good wishes to All of You. Hugs and Prayers, Diana
Posts.Title: I sent the ornament.

Posts.Content: had one right after lumpectomy because of arimidex. off arimidex for good i hope. miserable med for me. tons of side effects. good luck to you all. diana
Posts.Title: Muscle Girls... was a Bone Density Test recommended for You?

Posts.Content: It is so hard to handle when things come so close together. I feel God sent you an angel in your new grand child. She will give you many happy times. I am so sorry for your loss. Again my prayers are with you and your family. xoxox Diana
Posts.Title: Trying to stay positive

Posts.Content: I am sorry I didnt see you two had special birthdays. Five years..how wonderful. Wishing many many more to come.  Hugs, Diana
Posts.Title: Five years ago today!
